text: aur (ai rasool) tum un hee ko zindagee ka sabase jyaada harees paoge aur mushariqon mein se har ek shakhs chaahata hai ki kaash usako hazaar baras kee umr dee jaatee haalaanki agar itanee toolaanee umr bhee dee jae to vah khuda ke azaab se chhutakaara dene vaalee nahin, aur jo kuchh vah log karate hain khuda use dekh raha hai
